thread.title: Convinient Hilton -
thread.title_full: Convinient Hilton - Review of Hilton Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Miaowmiaowmiaow
title: Convinient Hilton -
text:
Nice Hilton Hotel at la Defense, only a few step away from the RER station, the CNIT and Quatre temps shopping. Extremely convinient !
The hotel bedrooms are quite large for Paris and my bed was confortable. My check in was efficient and breakfast overall good.
I had free wifi in my bedroom and it worked well.
I would only regret my window view as i didn't had an outdoor view but was facing the interior of the CNIT and reception which result in lack of privacy. Your curtain must be 100% of the time closed overwise everybody can see through your room and you dont't get natural daylight... very strange building agencement; I didn't appreciate that, but despite this I really like all the rest.
Room Tip: Room with outdoor view. See more room tips
